attributes.action: Return the remains of Mary Queen of Scots to Scotlnd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have launched my campaign to bring back to Scotland the remains of Mary Queen of Scots. She was illegaly tried and executed of fabricated charges by the English Government and Elizabeth I. 1587. I have the support of Christine Grahame MSP in the Scottish Parliament and Scottish Classical composer James MacMillan. I have been in comunication with Westminster Abbey where the remains of Mary have been held since 1612.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Church of England.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
